com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition

Class SpenTextRecognitionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition.SpenRecognitionManager
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition.SpenTextRecognitionManager

  • public final class SpenTextRecognitionManager
extends SpenRecognitionManager
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenTextRecognition instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SPEN_TEXT
      The full class name of the preloaded TextRecognitionPlugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoList

        public List<SpenRecognitionInfo> getInfoList(int inputType,
                                    int outputType)
        Get the information list with the specified input type and output type.
        The list includes all available TextRecognition Plug-ins with the given inputType and outputType .
        Parameters:
        inputType - The input object type for the recognition plug-in.
        outputType - The output object type of the recognition plug-in.
        Returns:
        The candidate list
        See Also:
        SpenObjectBase.TYPE_NONE, SpenObjectBase.TYPE_STROKE, SpenObjectBase.TYPE_TEXT_BOX, SpenObjectBase.TYPE_IMAGE, SpenObjectBase.TYPE_CONTAINER

      • getPrivateKeyHint

        public String getPrivateKeyHint(SpenRecognitionInfo info)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                InstantiationException,
                                IllegalAccessException
        Get a private key hint for the recognition plug-in.
        Parameters:
        info - The recognition information object.
        Returns:
        The private key hint.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        InstantiationException - Thrown when the constructor is not accessible during instantiation.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown when the class methods are not accessible.

      • createRecognition

        public SpenTextRecognition createRecognition(SpenRecognitionInfo info)
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                             Exception
        Create an SpenTextRecognition instance with the specified recognition information from the candidate information list.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList(int, int).
        Parameters:
        info - The recognition information object.
        Returns:
        The SpenTextRecognition instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the recognition instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        destroyRecognition(SpenTextRecognition)

      • createRecognition

        public SpenTextRecognition createRecognition(SpenRecognitionInfo info,
                                    String key)
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                             Exception
        Create an SpenTextRecognition instance with the specified recognition information from the candidate information list and the specified key.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList(int, int)
        Parameters:
        info - The recognition information object.
        key - The private key for the recognition instance.
        Returns:
        The SpenTextRecognition instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the recognition instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        getPrivateKeyHint(SpenRecognitionInfo), destroyRecognition(SpenTextRecognition)

      • createRecognition

        public SpenTextRecognition createRecognition(String className)
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                             Exception
        Create an SpenTextRecognition instance with the specified full class name.
        If you know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without making a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug–in
        Returns:
        The SpenTextRecognition instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the className passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the recognition instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        destroyRecognition(SpenTextRecognition)

      • createRecognition

        public SpenTextRecognition createRecognition(String className,
                                    String key)
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                             Exception
        Create an SpenTextRecognition instance directly with the specified full class name and key.
        If you already know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without make a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug-in.
        key - The private key for the recognition plug-in.
        Returns:
        The SpenTextRecognition instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the className passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the recognition instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the recognition engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        getPrivateKeyHint(SpenRecognitionInfo), destroyRecognition(SpenTextRecognition)

      • destroyRecognition

        public void destroyRecognition(SpenTextRecognition recognition)
        Destroy the currently loaded text recognition instance.
        Parameters:
        recognition - The SpenTextRecognition instance to destroy.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the recognition plug-in passed is not a loaded plug-in.
        See Also:
        createRecognition(SpenRecognitionInfo), createRecognition(SpenRecognitionInfo, String), createRecognition(String), createRecognition(String, String)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes an SpenTextRecognitionManager instance.
